C

calculateBayesDenominator(Instance) - Method in class bayes_network.classification.NaiveBayesClassifier
Given that Bayes Theorem is:

P(Y|X) = P(X|Y) / P(X)

This method calculates the denominator P(X)
calculateBayesNumerator(Instance, Integer) - Method in class bayes_network.classification.NaiveBayesClassifier
Given that Bayes Theorem is:

P(Y|X) = P(X|Y) / P(X)

This method calculates the numerator P(X|Y)

classAttrConditionalProbability(Instance, Integer) - Method in class bayes_network.classification.NaiveBayesClassifier
Calculate the conditional probability of a set of non-class attributes If we denote the class attribute Y, this method calculates:
P( X | Y = y )
Where X is the set of non-class attributes, X = {X_1...X_n}.

clone() - Method in class bayes_network.VariableSet
 
conditionalJointProbability(Pair<Attribute, Integer>, Pair<Attribute, Integer>, Integer) - Method in class bayes_network.builders.TANBuilder
Calculate the conditional joint probability of two values of two attributes conditioned on a specific value of the class attribute.
conditionalMutualInfo(Attribute, Attribute) - Method in class bayes_network.builders.TANBuilder
Calculate the conditional mutual information between two attributes conditioned on the class attribute:
I(X1, X2 | Y)

Where Y is the class attribute

Conditional mutual information is calculated as follows:

Σ y ∈ Y Σ x1 ∈ X1 Σ x2 ∈ X2 P(x1, x2 | y) / ( P(x1 | y) * P(x2 | y) )
conditionalProbability(Pair<Attribute, Integer>, Integer) - Method in class bayes_network.builders.TANBuilder
Calculate the conditional probability of two values of two attributes conditioned on a specific value of the class attribute.
conditionVariables - Variable in class bayes_network.BNConditionalQuery
Each pair of integers represents an Attribute ID and the nominal value ID of the attribute.
